A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I just watched the movie yesterday and I absolutely love how the film is exploring the characters of Kylo Ren and Rey. I also love the message of the movie\, where they're deviating from the classic (cliche) good always triumphs and evil will always be defeated\, where balance is needed. I might watch it again in the cinemas if I have time to. There are some scenes where it tries hard to be funny though.
